description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME:\\ \-> This has changed to Jan 17, 2024\ \\ \-> In IST (1400hrs)\\ Transport, Public Services and Procurement Canada are looking to purchase Collaborative Soft Seating for the Hybrid Project by March 25th, 2024\ \\ \->   –REQUIRED Documents which should be submitted include:\\\ \\ \->  Bid Submission. Basically, that is it. \\ ,\  All bids received after the January 17, 2024, 14:00 (IST)\ time will be declared non-responsive. \\ The contract value is not explicitly stated in the document.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Purchase of Collaborative Furniture (Soft Seating) for Hybrid Project

**Reference Number**: WS4231653058-Doc4352243020
**Amendment Number**: 4
**Solicitation Number**: WS4231653058

**Tender Details**

* **Publication Date**: January 2, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: January 17, 2024, 14:00:00 EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: March 20, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2025

**Tender Status**
Cancelled

**Procurement Method**
Competitive - Open Bidding

**Notice Type**
RFP against Supply Arrangement

**Selection Criteria**
Lowest Price

**Regions of Delivery**
Ottawa, Canada

**Contracting Entity**
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Contact Information**

* **Name**: Christopher Finnigan (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email**: christopher.finnigan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Notice URL**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18404460?extsite=MTg0MDQ0NjBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Description**

Public Services and Procurement Canada, on behalf of Transport Canada, requires collaborative soft seating for a hybrid project. Amendment to closing time: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by January 17th, 2024, at 14:00:00 EST. All bids submitted after 14:00:00 EST will be declared nonresponsive.

**Trade Agreements**

Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
